message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is significant to you, but I am only able to offer $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10000 is a good price for you, but I'm still looking to get a better return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11000. I think this is a fair compromise that works for both of us.
